cn select

Shows the current selection.

cn select KEYPAIR

Selects KEYPAIR on this terminal. Some commands will use this key pair by default.

cn unselect key pair

Removes the key pair selection.

cn select STORE

Selects STORE on this terminal. Some commands will use this store by default.

cn unselect store

Removes the store selection.

cn select ACTOR

Selects ACTOR on this terminal. Some commands will use this store by default.

cn unselect actor

Removes the actor selection.

cn unselect

Removes any selection.

Syntax

Open
